system.description: This spell allows the caster to perform simple magical effects for the duration, each of which is treated as a normal action. Examples include chilling, warming, flavoring, coloring, cleaning, soiling, or levitating a small object (weighing no more than one pound, and filling an area no more than one cubic foot). You can even create small objects, although they are crude and fragile, and not suitable for use as tools, weapons or spell components. Any effects (other than moving, cleaning or soiling) revert when the spell duration expires.
